channel.title: Titanpk client issues. Please help!

item.title: Titanpk client issues. Please help!
item.dc:creator: @killa_zero killa zero
item.description:
@killa_zero wrote:

package settings;
import java.awt.Color;

public class ClientSettings {

public static String getCacheDir() {
return System.getProperty(“user.home”) + “/TitanPKCache”;
}
public static final String cacheLink = “http://dl.dropbox.com/u/17120293/titancache.zip”;
public static int cacheRevision = 15;
public static int clientRevision = 671;
public static final String clientLink = “http://titanpk.site40.net/TitanPK.jar”;
public static final double clientVersion = 7.5;

public static final String ip = “127.0.0.1”;
public static final int port = 43594;
public static final String background_music_name = “Scape Santa”;
public static final String serverName = “TitanPK”;
public static final String websiteLink = “http://titanpk.site40.net”;
public static final Color startLoadClientBackgroundColor = Color.black;
public static final boolean disable_server_list = true;
public static final boolean disable_ukeys_check = true;
public static final boolean disable_keys_request = true;
}

How do i change this to just use cache from C:\user\cache instead of trying to dl it because i already have the cache and the dropbox no longer exists?

Read full topic
